solution_line_template: The cost of the ice cream is {num_ice_cream} × ${cost_per_ice_cream} = $<<{num_ice_cream}*{cost_per_ice_cream}={total_ice_cream}>>{total_ice_cream}.
The cost of the frozen yoghurt is {num_frozen_yoghurt} × ${cost_per_frozen_yoghurt} = $<<{num_frozen_yoghurt}*{cost_per_frozen_yoghurt}={total_frozen_yoghurt}>>{total_frozen_yoghurt}.
Caleb spent ${total_ice_cream} − ${total_frozen_yoghurt} = ${difference} more on ice cream than on frozen yogurt.
